title: Start
body:
<<pauseFor Mia 1.0>>
<<faceLeft Mia>>
<<faceLeft Renata>>
<<pauseFor Renata 1.0>>
Renata: I don't see how to get past the water.
<<hideLayer water1>>
<<pauseFor Mia 1.0>>
<<hideLayer water2>>
Mia: What was that all about?
<<unhide FurFur>>
<<moveRight FurFur 100 30>>
Mia: Um...what is that?
Renata: It's a monster!
Renata-renatafightface: Let's fight it!
<<detachFrom Renata Mia>>
<<moveToY Renata stairs 0 80>>
Mia-miaworriedface: Uh....
<<moveToX Renata stairs -100 100>>
[[thefightstarts]]

title: thefightstarts
body:
<<moveToY Renata FurFur 0 80>>
<<moveToX Renata FurFur 15 80>>
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Renata>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 14>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.5>>
<<moveRight FurFur 5 10>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 15>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<moveLeft Renata 3 60>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 16>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.2>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 17>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 16>>
<<moveRight Renata 3 60>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 15>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 14>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.7>>[[furfurhits]]

title: furfurhits
body:
<<moveRight FurFur 5 100>>
<<moveRight Renata 10 60>>
Renata-renatafightface: Ouch! This thing is pretty strong.
<<moveLeft FurFur 5 30>>
<<moveRight FurFur 1 30>>
[[secondtry]]

title: secondtry
body:
<<moveToX Renata FurFur 15 40>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.5>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 15>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<moveLeft Renata 3 60>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 16>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.2>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 17>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 16>>
<<moveRight Renata 3 60>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 15>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 14>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.7>>
[[furfurhits2]]

title: furfurhits2
body:
<<moveRight FurFur 5 100>>
<<moveRight Renata 15 70>>
Renata-renatafightface: Ahhhh!
<<moveLeft FurFur 5 30>>
<<moveRight FurFur 1 30>>
[[miaschoice]]

title: miaschoice
body:
Mia-miaworriedface: ...
<<setBgMusic ThemeOfHeroism.mp3>>
Mia-miaangryface: I've got you Renata!!
<<disableCollisions Mia>>
<<moveToY Mia Renata 0 100>>
<<moveToX Mia Renata 30 100>>
Mia-miaangryface: Renata! Hold your shoulders still!
Renata-renataworriedface: Wha...?
<<moveToX Mia Renata 15 100>>
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Mia>>
<<moveUp Mia 15 100>>
<<moveToX Mia Renata 0 100>>
<<moveDown Mia 2 80>>
<<pauseFor Mia 0.1>>
<<moveUp Mia 4 100>>
<<moveLeft Mia 20 100>>
<<faceRight Mia>>
<<moveLeft Mia 30 100>>
<<moveDown Mia 10 80>>
[[weunite]]

title: weunite
body:
<<animationFrame Mia mia 14>>
<<pauseFor Mia 1.0>>
Mia-miafiercefight: Take this!!!
<<animationFrame Mia mia 15>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<moveRight Mia 8 60>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 16>>
<<moveRight FurFur 10 80>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 17>>
<<pauseFor Mia 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 16>>
<<moveLeft Mia 8 60>>
<<moveLeft FurFur 1 30>>
<<pauseFor Mia 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 15>>
<<pauseFor Mia 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 14>>
[[renatahitsnow]]

title: renatahitsnow
body:
Renata: Haha! Yes!
<<moveToX Renata FurFur 5 80>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.25>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 15>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<moveLeft Renata 3 60>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 16>>
<<moveLeft FurFur 10 80>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.4>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 17>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 16>>
<<moveRight Renata 3 60>>
<<moveRight FurFur 1 30>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 15>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 14>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.2>>

[[furfurdies]]

title: furfurdies
body:
<<hide FurFur>>
<<pauseFor Mia 1.0>>
<<moveUp Mia 10 80>>
<<moveDown Mia 10 80>>
<<moveUp Renata 10 80>>
<<moveDown Renata 10 80>>
Mia-miaexcitedface: Woohoo!
Renata: We did it!!!!
[[ohnoes]]

title: ohnoes
body:
<<attachTo FurFur3 FurFur2>>
<<attachTo FurFur4 FurFur2>>
<<unhide FurFur2>>
<<unhide FurFur3>>
<<unhide FurFur4>>
<<setBgMusic SindarinBuleria.mp3>>
<<moveRight FurFur2 100 30>>
<<faceLeft Mia>>
<<faceLeft Renata>>
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Mia>>
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Renata>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 20>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 14>>
<<moveRight Mia 10 20>>
<<moveRight Renata 10 20>>
Mia-miaworriedface: Um....
Renata: I don't think we can take all those by ourselves...
[[herecomeshaia]]

title: herecomeshaia
body:
<<unhide Haia>>
<<moveDown Haia 150 70>>
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Haia>>
<<moveUp Haia 10 100>>
<<moveDown Haia 10 100>>
<<coupleMovementAndAnimation Haia>>
<<moveToX Haia StairsEntrance 0 100>>
<<moveToY Haia StairsEntrance 0 100>>
<<moveRight Haia 40 80>>
<<moveToY Haia FurFur2 0 80>>
<<faceRight Haia>>
<<pauseFor Haia 0.5>>
<<faceRight Haia>>
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Haia>>
<<moveToX Haia FurFur2 30 220>>
<<hide FurFur4>>
<<hide FurFur3>>
<<hide FurFur2>>
<<coupleMovementAndAnimation Haia>>
<<moveLeft Haia 1 10>>
<<pauseFor Haia 0.5>>
<<moveRight Haia 20 80>>
[[theexplanation]]

title: theexplanation
body:
Haia: What are you girls doing in here?!?!?! This is a dangerous place!
Renata: We......saw you looking worried and thought you needed help and thought if we helped you we could-
Haia: Help me by getting lost in an ancient ruin full of monsters?
<<faceRight Mia>>
<<pauseFor Mia 0.1>>
Mia: (Told you)
<<faceLeft Mia>>
Haia: You know what? Let's just get out of here.
<<coupleMovementAndAnimation Renata>>
<<coupleMovementAndAnimation Mia>>
<<attachTo Mia Haia>>
<<attachTo Renata Haia>>
<<moveLeft Haia 100 40>>
<<toMap ruinsentrance 3>>
[[end]]
